snippet.title: Apple II Game: Beneath  Apple Manor (1978 Software Factory)
snippet.description: An early graphical rogue-rpg ike dungeon crawl. The goal is to find the Golden Apple, buried somewhere deep in the basement beneath the manor. In addition to  monsters which you have to fight, you can also find treasures, secret doors and hidden traps in the dungeons.
